doc: is a simple material in terms of rendering that perform lookups on a 2d map blended optionally with the per vertex color input.

properties.name: postVertexColor
properties.doc: Specifies the factor which controls how much of the per vertex color we want to transmit.

properties.name: postGain
properties.doc: Specifies the factor to be applied to the vertex color.

properties.name: matteMap
properties.doc: Specifies the matte map to use. It is expected to be in sRGB color space.

properties.name: usesMatteMap
properties.doc: Specifies whether we use a matte map or not.

properties.name: matteFilter
properties.doc: Specifies the color filter to be applied on the matte map lookup.

properties.name: matteGain
properties.doc: Specifies the gain applied to the rgb components of the matte map lookup.

properties.name: matteAlphaGain
properties.doc: Specifies the gain applied to the alpha of the matte map lookup.
